content: Well to start off, thanks for reading this. Here goes.... Last year Dennis and I had a small get together at our house to celebrate his 60th and his dad's 85th birthday. We invited close friends and neighbors. This was last May, great weather, etc. Anyway, 3 of our neighbors came in 1 pickup, Karen Woody and Mike. Well when Mike got out of the truck, or should I say stumbled, he ran right into our house. I said to him, damn Mike drunk already??? He was so drunk he embarassed me and my family. We had people in their 80's here along with my dad and Dennis parents. K, later in the same year, we get an invite to Karens 50th BD. That was fine, but we had to go to Mikes house to celebrate it. And then, this past weekend we get an invite to Mike's 55th birthday. Dennis didn't really want to go, but I wanted to. I tried to overlook Mike, (drunk). We went out to eat at a nice little place here in town. As the night goes on we chat. Later on the subject of weight comes up. Toni, which is Karen and Woodys daughter was there. Mike told Toni that she looked a lot better since she has gained some weight. Mike told her to stand up and turn around so he could see her butt. Toni is 28 years old. I could not believe that he said that to her, considering he is old enough to be her father. And plus with her mom and dad sitting right there next to him. Mike, Karen and Woody are real close........ When we got home I asked Dennis how he would feel if one of his friends told his daughter that she had a nice butt. Dennis reply was, "I don't have friends like that". Ok, just venting.........

I could not believe that he said that to her, considering he is old enough to be her father. And plus with her mom and dad sitting right there next to him. Mike, Karen and Woody are real close........ When we got home I asked Dennis how he would feel if one of his friends told his daughter that she had a nice butt. Dennis reply was, "I don't have friends like that". Ok, just venting.........
title: Just Venting.......

content: Well, we are not really friends with him any more. A while back when Dennis' back was really hurting I asked Mike if he would tractor mow our pasture, using our equipment. And I would pay him. He didn't have the time, but yet he was doing all kinds of things for Woody and Karen. Plus, I don't really think he likes me cause I am a hard headed woman and I will say what I feel.... Oh, I wanted to knocked the chit out of him that day. He also sat down on the couch next to my mother n law and said to her "I am f'd up". Oh, I wished I was there to hear it. Mom n law told me that after the party was over.

If not, I would suggest that Karen and Woody don't bring Mike back. I'd probably even go so far as to suggest that if they really care about him, that they should help him with his problem drinking -- AA. As far as Woody's daughter....1) She is 28 so she should be able to speak for herself. 2) The ball is in Woody or Karen's court... But old Mike wouldn't be back at my house.
